Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Anthony Crotinger
Reviews.Content: Since I needed a good unlocked phone that was a good basic phone this one worked great. I bought one for me and one for my wife.

ProductInfo.Features:
Battery enables talk time up to 6.67 hours and stand-by up to 400 hours
Rear 3.2MP Fixed-Focus Camera and Camcorder
3.5" HVGA 480x320 touchscreen
MicroSD supports up to 32GB; Internal ROM 512MB; Internal RAM 256MB
Unlocked GSM phone will work on GSM networks such as AT&T; and T-Mobile will not work on CDMA networks
ProductInfo.Name: Huawei U8652 Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Black
